Message: I don't want to train, but I need.

It's natural to feel apprehensive about pushing yourself, especially when it's something required rather than desired. However, remember that every step towards self-improvement brings you closer to your goals. Let's make this journey more enjoyable by focusing on small victories and progress, one day at
I don't want to trian, unless you can change my mind

Challenging yourself may not always feel like pleasure in the moment, yet the rewards of growth and accomplishment are undeniably fulfilling. Let's work together to reignite your motivation. What aspect of training do you enjoy least, so we can start there addressing misgivings?
Tell me why I have to train today, otherwise I don't want to think.

Today's training might not hold the same weight as every session, given its spontaneous nature. Yet, seizing the opportunity to advance even a little can make a difference over time.
